title: Obama calls on Democrats to 'toughen up' during a fundraiser
shortDescription: As the Democratic party grows increasingly frustrated with its leaders, former President Barack Obama calls on the party to stand up for what's right.

title: English only: Trump clamping down on multilingual federal services
shortDescription: Some federal court rulings have found that failing to provide certain services in other languages can be discriminatory.

title: States sue Trump admin to restore billions in school funding
shortDescription: Unable to adequately budget for the upcoming year, school districts have been scrambling for weeks. Democratic attorneys general are stepping in.

title: 'Oh really?': Trump says his wife Melania has some thoughts on Putin
shortDescription: Melania Trump has highlighted Russia's continued attacks on Ukraine in private conversations, President Trump said on Monday.

title: Supreme Court gives Trump a win, says he can fire Education Department workers
shortDescription: The Trump administration appealed a court order blocking mass layoffs and other changes at the Education Department.

title: Democrats find 'vile' conditions at 'Alligator Alcatraz' migrant jail
shortDescription: The Democratic lawmakers weren't allowed to talk to the detainees or examine their cells.

title: Jeffrey Epstein: How the Trump team promised a blockbuster reveal
shortDescription: President Trump's climbdown on his administration's talk of a Jeffery Epstein "client list" has infuriated the MAGA movement.

title: Rosie O’Donnell fires back after Trump’s citizenship threat
shortDescription: Rosie O’Donnell has fired back after U.S. President Donald Trump threatened to revoke her citizenship, calling her “a threat to humanity” and saying she should stay in Ireland.

title: US trade partners react to Trump's 30% tariffs
shortDescription: Key trade partners reacted to President Donald Trump's announcement of 30% tariff on goods from certain countries, saying they hope to make a deal.

title: Trump booed at FIFA final. See other sporting events he has attended
shortDescription: Trump attended FIFA Club World Cup final, receiving boos, some cheers while celebrating with the team. He's been to other high-profile sports events.

title: Trump announces NATO weapons deal
shortDescription: In a meeting with NATO Chief Mark Rutte, Trump announced a weapons deal to deliver aid to Ukraine.

title: 'I made every decision': Biden defends frequent use of autopen
shortDescription: Joe Biden said every pardon and commutation he issued was his decision, calling Republican "liars" for alleging his aides illegally used an autopen.

title: Trump threatens steep tariffs on Russia, touts Ukraine weapons deal
shortDescription: Trump said the United States would put secondary tariffs on countries that do business with Russia if a peace deal is not reached in 50 days.

title: Democrats use MAGA's Jeffrey Epstein fury against Trump
shortDescription: Lawmakers from the left are putting pressure on what has become a sensitive spot for Trump with his growingly frustrated base.

title: Trump jabs at Putin, moves to send Ukraine weapons
shortDescription: “I am very disappointed with President Putin,” Trump said July 13. “I thought he was somebody that meant what he said."

title: After passing big tax bill, Capitol Republicans turn to new problems
shortDescription: From government funding to implementing DOGE cuts, Congressional Republicans still have their hands full.

title: Trump says FBI's Bongino 'in good shape' amid Epstein probe fallout
shortDescription: The former Secret Service agent and conservative media personality is said to be weighing his resignation from the FBI.

title: King Charles to host Trump in September for state visit
shortDescription: "His Majesty the King will host the President and Mrs Trump at Windsor Castle," Buckingham Palace said in a statement.

title: Trump says the US will send Patriot missiles to Ukraine
shortDescription: The United States, Trump stressed, would not pay for them as he heaped fresh criticism on Russian President Vladimir Putin.

title: Secret Service did not 'act on direct threats' before Trump shooting: Senate report
shortDescription: Homeland Security Committee Chairman Rand Paul released the Senate report on the anniversary of the shooting in Butler, Pennsylvania.

title: Trump announces tariffs on Mexico, European Union
shortDescription: President Donald Trump posted letters to the leaders of Mexico and the European Union, saying they had not done enough to head off the new tariffs.

title: Trump attends FIFA Club World Cup Final
shortDescription: A previous version of this video incorrectly referred to the World Cup. The competition is called the Club World Cup.

title: Trump 'border czar' responds to California farmworker's death
shortDescription: According to multiple reports, Jaime Alanis climbed to the roof of a greenhouse in alleged attempt to evade officers.
